title: J&J to end COVID vaccine manufacturing deal with Emergent Biosolutions; Companies accuse each other of breaching contract
text:
J&J provided a formal notice of termination and breach to Emergent on Monday, J&J said.

The contract disclosure Monday came after Emergent BioSolutions said in a securities filing that it had sent a notice of material breach of the agreement to J&J.

The contract manufacturer experienced contamination problems at its plant in Baltimore, which resulted in the destruction of key ingredients that would have amounted to roughly 400 million doses of COVID-19 vaccines from J&J and AstraZeneca PLC UK:AZN, according to a recent congressional committee report.

An expanded version of this report appears on WSJ.com.
